title: Find a researcher - WCHRI
sitename: Women and Children's Health Research Institute
cleaned_text: Below is a list of our academic members. Narrow down the list by typing in a last name or keyword, or use the drop-down lists to filter by research area and/or theme. Open a profile to find out more about a researcher's work.
